Content.Text:
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How many times do I have to tell you? If
you're feeling bad, you need to stay
here before leaving.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm too delicate for your hospital beds,
doc, what can I say? Take me home and
then leave me be.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
And I'm telling you that isn't going to
happen!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You need to listen to what your patients
are asking of you! You medical monster!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! Perfect timing.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I've just eaten a little too much and so
I'm not feeling in top condition.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I came to get Klaus to check me out, but
now he won't let me leave again!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What are you talking about? All I want
is you to stay here and sleep a while.
You're the one being unreasonable!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I can't sleep on your horrible hospital
beds! I want to go home and sleep.
<PAGE>
However, I'm too sore and aching to
make it home on my own. That's the
problem.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's where you come in, <MYNAME>. Will
you help to get me home?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I cannot believe you! Go on then, 
<MYNAME>, take him out of here!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Great! I certainly don't want to make my
way home supported by a man!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll return home on the arm of a 
charming young lady! What do you say,
<MYNAME>?
Never going to happen
Okay

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Exactly the response I expected. In
fact, you should be even angrier!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
N-No she shouldn't. I'm sick, okay?
Treat the sick with some respect!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm going. I'm scared of <MYNAME> now! I
think it's safer to go it alone.
<PAGE>
See you both later.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
He's quite a pain in my proverbial
medical posterior, that one. He was just
looking for some TLC, I guess.
<PAGE>
No need to worry about it, <MYNAME>. You
know him, he'll be right as rain again
by tomorrow.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, are you sure? Great! You can
carry me on your back, okay?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you don't agree... I'm not going
anywhere!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dial it down a little, Soseki. I think
you should change your mind, too,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. I'm so moved!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you are kinder than I personally
could ever hope to fathom.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're strong, carrying me like this!
Hah hah hah, it's fun, too!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, don't get upset! I was trying to
give you a complement.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You want to know what drove me to eat
so much, do you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>As you get older, you sometimes come
across things you just can't put up
with.
<PAGE>
If you let them get out of control then
society would be a mess. So you avoid 
them by running to something else.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so glad you were there today,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It felt like all the nasty stuff inside
me was being washed away. Thanks!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah! Did you take all that gunk
I just said seriously? I'm just playing
with you!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something about her... making
me spill my guts like that.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Anyway, I'm home. Thanks, <MYNAME>.
